reviewText:
If you are thinking of being suckered into buying this, don't bother.
The sound and print quality are execrable. This is a real no-no.

SLASHER CINEMA 4 Movie Pack features many well-known actors in the three 1970s titles here. CONTENTS: CRAZE-- Solid cast in this British-made chiller. An idol-worshipping antiques dealer goes off the deep end and starts sacrificing humans to "Chuku Mottram." THE DEMON-- A string of motiveless and gruesome murders by a person unknown adds to the terror of potential victims targeted for the kill. THE GLOVE-- Bounty hunter goes up against his most dangerous foe: a very big and violent man who kills with an equally large armor-plated police riot glove. Another strong cast here. MEMORIAL VALLEY MURDERS-- Homicidal axeman sets his sights on holiday campers. Stars longtime TV actor John Kerry (no, not the politician!) PSYCHOS is a similarly-themed 4 movie set from BCI / Eclipse. BRENTWOOD's 4-fers are nicely priced movie bundles. Video and sound quality of these digitally unrestored public domain films is generally fine. Discs are dual-side recorded. . Parenthetical numbers preceding titles are 1 to 10 viewer poll ratings found at a film resource website. (3.9) Craze (UK-1974) - Jack Palance/Diana Dors/Hugh Griffith/Dame Edith Evans/Trevor Howard (3.3) The Demon (S Africa/Netherlands-1979) - Jennifer Holmes/Cameron Mitchell/Craig Gardner (5.0) The Glove (1979) - John Saxon/Roosevelt Grier/Joanna Cassidy/Joan Blondell/Jack Carter/Aldo Ray/Keenan Wynn (2.5) Memorial Valley Massacre (1988) - John Kerry/Mark Mears/Lesa Lee/Cameron Mitchell
